Toolbar Dialog

Description

The Toolbar Dialog component provides customizing functionality for toolbars.

Classes

  • QtToolBarManager
  • QtToolBarDialog

Tested platforms

  • Qt 4.4, 4.5 / Windows XP / MSVC.NET 2005
  • Qt 4.4, 4.5 / Linux / gcc
  • Qt 4.4, 4.5 / MacOS X 10.5 / gcc
